data.thought: S6|H|S5|Swarm Phenotype A2: 'Adversarial Debate'. Two+ notebooks take opposing positions on design decision. Each uses Thoughtbox to build arguments, attacks other's reasoning, defends own position. Observatory visualizes debate in real-time. Human observes, interjects, guides. Final synthesis notebook reconciles. Use case: architecture decisions, policy evaluation, risk assessment. Emergent property: collective intelligence > individual.
